repo.title: Squarkup Repo
repo.description: Displayed name of the repository, shown in the page `title`.

site.title: Site Directory
site.description: Base directory of the site. Relative to root.

sources.title: Source Directory(s)
sources.description: Directory(s) where Squarkdown starts searching for files to squarkup. Relative to root.

dest.title: Destination Directory
dest.description: Base directory where files are exported to. Relative to site.

file-source.title: Export File Source
file-source.description: File Squarkdown uses as the template for exported `.svx` files. Relative to site.

styles.title: Styles Directory
styles.description: Base directory where Squarkdown looks for stylesheets. Relative to site.

page-styles.title: Page Styles Directory
page-styles.description: Directory where Squarkdown looks for individual page styles. Relative to site.

assets.title: Assets Directory
assets.description: Base directory where Squarkdown looks for static assets. Relative to root.

site-assets.title: Site Assets Directory
site-assets.description: Directory containing site-specific assets which Squarkdown moves into the root of `static/`. Relative to root.

exclude.title: Excluded Files
exclude.description: RegEx patterns determining which files to skip squarkup for. These are matched against the entire absolute path of each file.

fonts.title: Fonts
fonts.description: Google Fonts URL queries for requesting font stylesheets.

if-no-dir.title: Nonexistent Directory Handling
if-no-dir.description: Action to take if an export directory does not exist.
